TopicTitle: Pteron Micro Shuttle and rescue vehicle Beta download available(9/9/2014)

Articles.Content:
Ah Ha, the H.A.R.P is getting dewinged, but it will have a Yaw fin somewhere.

Thanks Chris

Oh I wish I had a graphics tablet.

So... we're looking at a rectangular-ish metal box with tail-fins... Am I the only one who is now humming Greased Lightnin'?

Can't wait to crashfly this baby!
There's a teaser in my siggy hehe.

Just a suggestion: if you look on the front of the US shuttle, the buran, the KSO shuttle the nose is shiny gray-dark gray material (Reinforced carbon-carbon) that withstands the higher heat in that area: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Space_Shuttle_thermal_protection_system also it looks a bit nicer imo to not have the grid like structure of the tiles "bulge" as much as they do at the front

It was Sage that wanted tiles in it.

It was initially...

I'm sorry Sage for posting pics here

Kliper had all tiled up nose though.

Hmm, personally I'd say something in between, that gray nose but smaller, though obviously that's just me, who isn't doing the work, and has no ownership of it. Large nose looks a bit... cartoony, no nose looks... weird, Kliper has no nose cone but it's all angled up front, not rounded, but again, just my Ã¢â€šÂ¬0.05
Well, it is meant to be cartoony KSP style
Hmm, I guess I'm too used to playing with KW, B9, KSPi etc all fairly realistic/futuristic looking stuff, but yeah it fits with stock well, btw does it have an IVA?
If not yet. It will have.
Nice, sadly a lot of mod devs seem to forget the IVA, which used to be forgivable but with RPM's MFDs etc IVAs are a lot more important all of a sudden imo.

Looking good Blackheart612.... I feel the need, the need for speed......

That lil' creature should get them down to Kerbin FAST......and maybe in just a few pieces....

speaking of that, if a Kerbal get blown into multiple parts, will each grow back as a full kerbal????? H'mmmm.......
Looking nice guys! Can't wait to put my jump module on it and go tumbling trough the atmosphere. Expect pics!

Hmm, I guess I'm too used to playing with KW, B9, KSPi etc all fairly realistic/futuristic looking stuff, but yeah it fits with stock well, btw does it have an IVA?

yeah there is a sketch of the IVA earlier in the thread, basic and easy to read displays for panicked Kerbals!

So... we're looking at a rectangular-ish metal box with tail-fins... Am I the only one who is now humming Greased Lightnin'?

Can't wait to crashfly this baby!

Oh my no, far more expensive design work goes into it than that....it will be a wedge shaped box with some fins on, completely different..more coffin shaped

something like this only really,really small.

Edited March 13, 2014 by Sage Sagan
Can't wait for this. I love the mini shuttle. It's kool to see other mini shuttles in development.

Oh my no, far more expensive design work goes into it than that....it will be a wedge shaped box with some fins on, completely different..more coffin shaped

something like this only really,really small.

heh isn't that a Kliper

Also epic shuttle i can't wait to cra- i mean err whats the word err lithobr- oh wait uhh launch yes launch that's the word and fly it to my new station

heh isn't that a Kliper

Also epic shuttle i can't wait to cra- i mean err whats the word err lithobr- oh wait uhh launch yes launch that's the word and fly it to my new station

Yes, that is the Kliper.
bobcat's soviet pack has the kliper, though the IVA is 3 rows of 2 seats and 2 MFDs at the front, and it's not FAR compatible

"Now taking pre-orders for the Pteron micro Shuttle"

this worried me... why is this on the front page? do we have to pay? :'( jeb has no cash!

"Now taking pre-orders for the Pteron micro Shuttle"

this worried me... why is this on the front page? do we have to pay? :'( jeb has no cash!

Nope it's just an old advertising ruse!

Nope it's just an old advertising ruse!

Lol, don't tease us!

"Now taking pre-orders for the Pteron micro Shuttle"

this worried me... why is this on the front page? do we have to pay? :'( jeb has no cash!

Why would Jeb PAY for the rocket? He would sneak into Sage's top secret research hanger, hop in the thing and blast off.

The Mass Key Shipyards would like to pre-order a pair of these wonderful space shoes, *coughs some* er I mean Ships. *looks around some* why do I keep calling them shoes???

We At The Mass Key shipyards have a craft that is awaiting one of this to be attached atop it for advanced testing.

(not really pre-made but I'm working on one right now thou, it will mostly be a piggy back system to get this up into space. )
This looks amazing. I want to find it and give it a hug, especially because it's based of Spiral...
I want it, but I still think it looks like a running shoe.
